entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT ENDED, Shelburne

entry.title: Thursday night: A few rain showers or flurries. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: A few rain showers changing to a few flurries after midnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming southwest 30 gusting to 60 late this evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 8:33 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 2 in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 2 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 8:33 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 30%
